definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
Doha Round (world trade talks that began in Doha, Qatar in 2001)

sentences.english: China joined into WTO, accompanying with the processes of Duha Round.
sentences.chinese: 中国加入WTO，同时也伴随着多哈回合的历程。

sentences.english: Many of the obstacles facing the Doha negotiations are political.
sentences.chinese: 多哈谈判面临的许多障碍都是政治性的。

sentences.english: The Duha Round is a new round of WTO multi-trade negotiation rounds.
sentences.chinese: 多哈回合是WTO的新一轮多边贸易谈判回合。

sentences.english: The DWP features a sturdy, anodised aluminium and stainless steel construction.
sentences.chinese: 多哈工作方案具有坚固，阳极铝和不锈钢的建设。

sentences.english: As the name suggests, this is an international news channel located at Doha in Qatar.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，这是一个位于卡塔尔多哈的国际新闻频道。

sentences.english: At the heart of the Doha Round lies agriculture, and appropriately so.
sentences.chinese: 多哈回合的核心是农业，而这也是适当的。

sentences.english: The North-South frame of the Doha negotiations ignored these cleavages.
sentences.chinese: 多哈谈判的南北会谈框架却忽视了这些分歧。

sentences.english: He called it the dumbing down of the Doha round.
sentences.chinese: 他称这过于简化了多哈回合。

sentences.english: They should also demonstrate in favor of liberalizing the economy and completing the Doha Development Round.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该支持经济自由化和完成多哈发展回合的政策。

sentences.english: Such attitudes were behind the wrecking of the Doha round of trade talks this week.
sentences.chinese: 这种态度就是破坏本周多哈回合贸易谈判的潜在原因。

sentences.english: S. and EU proposed the idea last week as part of the Doha round of trade negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 上周欧美在多哈回合贸易谈判中已提交了这项建议。

sentences.english: The second reason to support Doha is to bolster the WTO itself.
sentences.chinese: 支持多哈谈判的第二个理由，是要支持世贸组织本身。
所以，为什么不重启多哈？

sentences.english: The Doha Round of multilateral trade negotiations is stalled and may very well fall apart.
sentences.chinese: 多哈回合多边贸易谈判陷入僵局，很可能彻底破裂。

definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
Zagreb, capital of Croatia 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4]
